metadata.title: Terms of Service | Onion Note
metadata.description: Terms of Service for Onion Note - Privacy-First Note Sharing Service

serviceDescription.title: 1. Service Description
serviceDescription.content: Onion Note is a free web-based service that allows users to create encrypted notes that they can share over the internet as unique one-time-use HTTPS URLs (hereafter referred to as links) which by default expire after its first access via any web browser.

userResponsibilities.title: 2. User Responsibilities
list: Maintaining the confidentiality of their note links and passwords
Choosing appropriate communication channels for sharing note links
The content of their notes and ensuring it complies with applicable laws
Any consequences resulting from the loss or unauthorized access to their note links

serviceModifications.content: Onion Note reserves the right to modify or discontinue, temporarily or permanently, the service with or without notice. We shall not be liable to you or any third party for any modification, suspension, or discontinuance of the service.

prohibitedUses.content: Users are prohibited from using the service to:

Impersonate any person or entity, or falsely state or otherwise misrepresent your affiliation with a person or entity

useOfCookies.title: 7. Use of Cookies
useOfCookies.content: Currently, Onion Note does not use any cookies. If we implement cookie usage in the future, we will update this policy and notify users of any changes.

changesToTerms.content: Onion Note reserves the right to modify these terms at any time. We will notify users of any material changes by posting the new terms on this page. Your continued use of the service after such modifications will constitute your acknowledgment of the modified terms.
